abstract.para: ESUP-ECM est l'outil de gestion de documents du projet ESUP-Portail

section.title: Important note
section.para: Because of uPortal limitation before 2.6.1 release in session objects management esup-lecture may produce null pointer exceptions randomly. For this esup-lecture, since 0.9.0 release has a full support of servlet mode. Please see “Servlet mode” section for more information.
